name: @guscrawford.com/loft-interface
description: The command-line, REST, or any other integration interface controlling input to loft scaffolder
author: Gus

scripts.build: echo "🛠  Building loft-interface" && tsc && fpm transform . --distFolder bin
scripts.install: cd ../core && yarn build && cd ../i && fpm install ../core/dist
scripts.preview: echo "👁  Previewing loft binary..." && echo "⚠️  Overwriting your global version of loft" && rm -rf "/Users/guscrawford/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/loft-interface" && yarn run clean && yarn run build && echo "🔄  Replacing your sources & binary.." && cp -r /Users/guscrawford/loft/i "/Users/guscrawford/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/loft-interface" && echo "🔑  Setting execute permission... 👤 👟" && chmod u+x ~/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/loft-interface/bin/main.js
